Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 3/2/1973 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Drafted in 5th round, 98th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1975...
Traded from New York (N) to Cleveland on 1/31/1981 (Going to NYM: C K. Tabuchi. Going to CLE: RF R. Lisi)...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/10/1981, off Rick A. Williams (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/8/1982, off Jon Matlack (NYY)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1983...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/14/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Injured on 9/28/1988 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 10/1/1989 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/2/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $2,670,000 per year...
Injured on 4/20/1991 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1995...
Injured on 7/16/1995 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
